metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27830 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: TightVNC before v2.8.75 allows attackers to escalate privileges on the host operating system via replacing legitimate files with crafted files when executing a file transfer. This is due to the fact that TightVNC runs in the backend as a high-privileges account.

criterions.comment: tightvnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
